text:
RELIGION

Bhagavatham: Kidambi Narayanan, Asthika Samajam, Venus Colony, Alwarpet, 6.30 p.m.

Thiruvalangalthirattu: T. Rajarathinam, 2015, 5th St., H Block, Anna Nagar West, 5 p.m.

CULTURE

Consulate-General of Japan in Chennai and ABK-AOTS Dosokai: Dance festival ‘A Night of Jasmine’ – Japanese dancers of Indian classical dances, Bharatiya Vidya Bhavan, Mylapore, 6 p.m. and Inauguration of Japan cultural festival, Chateau D’Ampa, 37 Nelson Manickam Rd., Aminjikarai, 11 a.m.

SAKKK College of Fine Arts: Inauguration of art exhibition ‘Chitramela 2016’, Achalam Art Gallery, Lakshmana Swamy Salai, K.K. Nagar, 11 a.m.

Sant Ravidas M.P. Handicrafts and Handloom Development Corporation: Inauguration of Crafts and Weaves exhibition-cum-sale, Kalakshetra, Thiruvanmiyur, 1.15 p.m.

GENERAL

Department of Criminology, University of Madras: Thirteenth Late S. Parthasarathy, I.P. (Retd.) Memorial Trust Endowment Lecture, 4 p.m., S.M. Diaz Hall, university campus

Science City: Science Day celebration, workshop on ‘Disaster Management,’ Queen Mary’s College, Kamarajar Salai, 10 a.m.

The Madras Printers and Lithographers Association and All India Federation of Master Printers: Distribution of relief funds to Chennai Flood Ravaged Printers, Beverly Hotel, 6 p.m.

SNEHA: Inauguration of conference, 9.30 a.m. and anniversary celebration, Hyatt Regency, 6.30 p.m.

Y.R.G. Care; International AIDS Vaccine Initiative; MAC AIDS Fund: Elocuation Finale, Stella Maris College, Cathedral Rd., 2 p.m.
title: Chennai today
